attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to guage the popularity of the current Prime Minister, Gordon Brown, AND NOT TO REQUEST AN ELECTION unlike the VOTE4CHANGE petition.

In the polls the Tories are troucing labour, we have high energy, oil, food, public transport and petrol prices and the Prime Minister is doing nothing to help the poor in the Country.

Recently Mr Brown was named the worst Prime Minister the UK has ever had, and of course he is the ONLY Prime Minister never to have won the right to be Prime Minister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
